QuestData.Title: War with the Horde
QuestData.Description:
Good to see you've received proper training as a $c.
We'll need it for what's next. The Alliance's war with the Horde has reached a fevered pitch... and we've lost a lot of good soldiers.
King Anduin is looking for aid in an operation to bolster our forces. I told him you'd be a good fit for the job.
Before you meet him, let me get get you caught up on what has been happening so far.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Captain Garrick to find out what is happening between the Horde and Alliance.
